Related repos

  • markup-based typesetting tool like LaTeX but simpler
  • gitignore templates for different languages, build tools, IDEs
  • online LaTeX editor for writing and collaborating on documents
  • Collaborative markdown notes in real-time
  • Collection of scripts and config files for setting up a Unix development environment
  • Open-source, local-first, self-hostable collaboration workspace
  • Frontend for documentation sites
  • Open source platform for PDF forms, multi-signer workflows, signature verification, API integrations
